message:
Hi! 
I am the creator of Challengein "the board game of the modern age", an iPhone app.
I've create the modern version of the board games, but where the user choose the Topic to play with (eg. Technology, videogames, etc.).

I want to find some startuppers who want to have fight their colleges with the Technology pack, who is a mix between tech and history of big startups (now companies). 
So will you fight?

If you want to try the app http://challengein.com and use "HINIIB" as invitation code (during the sign up process).

Bye!
Claudio ;)
Did you copy and paste this in? The formatting is weird.
Makes me want a "flag as spam" button
is it really spam if it doesn't seem like anyone is really listening?
